short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate and display QR code for the current URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scan2Phone is a simple and convenient Chrome extension that generates a QR code for the current tab’s URL, making it easy to transfer links from your computer to your phone in seconds. No more typing out lengthy web addresses or searching for the same page on another device. With just one click, Scan2Phone converts any URL into a QR code, allowing you to scan it instantly and open the link on your smartphone or tablet.

Key Features:

Instant QR Code Generation: Generate a QR code of the current URL in your Chrome tab with a single click.
Seamless Cross-Device Browsing: Easily transfer links between your computer and mobile devices by scanning the QR code with your phone’s camera.
User-Friendly Interface: A minimal, clean design that’s easy to use, perfect for quick link sharing.
Privacy-Focused: No data tracking or sharing; all QR codes are generated locally on your browser.
Scan2Phone is perfect for anyone who frequently switches between devices or wants a fast, reliable way to open links on their phone. Whether you’re saving a page for later or sharing a link with others, Scan2Phone has you covered!
